mapper.delete: delete from ujcms_article_ext where id_ in (select t.id_ from ujcms_article t where t.channel_id_ = #{channelId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
delete from ujcms_article_ext where id_ in (select t.id_ from ujcms_article t where t.site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update ujcms_article_ext set title_ = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subtitle_ = #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, full_title_ = #{fullTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alias_ = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_url_ = #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target_blank_ = #{targetBlank,jdbcType=CHAR}, seo_keywords_ = #{seoKeywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seo_description_ = #{seoDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author_ = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, editor_ = #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_ = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_ = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_ = #{video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_orig_ = #{videoOrig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_duration_ = #{videoDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, audio_ = #{audio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audio_orig_ = #{audioOrig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audio_duration_ = #{audioDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_ = #{file,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_name_ = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_length_ = #{fileLength,jdbcType=BIGINT}, doc_ = #{doc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_orig_ = #{docOrig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_name_ = #{docName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_length_ = #{docLength,jdbcType=BIGINT}, article_template_ = #{articleTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, article_static_path_ = #{articleStaticPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, allow_comment_ = #{allowComment,jdbcType=CHAR}, static_file_ = #{staticFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_static_file_ = #{mobileStaticFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, process_instance_id_ = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reject_reason_ = #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, baidu_push_ = #{baiduPush,jdbcType=CHAR}, editor_type_ = #{editorType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, image_list_json_ = #{imageListJson,jdbcType=OTHER}, file_list_json_ = #{fileListJson,jdbcType=OTHER}, text_ = #{text,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, markdown_ = #{markdown,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, mains_json_ = #{mainsJson,jdbcType=OTHER}, clobs_json_ = #{clobsJson,jdbcType=OTHER} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_article_ext (id_, title_, subtitle_, full_title_, alias_, link_url_, target_blank_, seo_keywords_, seo_description_, author_, editor_, source_, image_, video_, video_orig_, video_duration_, audio_, audio_orig_, audio_duration_, file_, file_name_, file_length_, doc_, doc_orig_, doc_name_, doc_length_, article_template_, article_static_path_, allow_comment_, static_file_, mobile_static_file_, process_instance_id_, reject_reason_, baidu_push_, editor_type_, comments_, downloads_, favorites_, ups_, downs_, views_, day_views_, week_views_, month_views_, quarter_views_, year_views_, image_list_json_, file_list_json_, text_, markdown_, mains_json_, clobs_json_) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetBlank,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{seoKeywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seoDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoOrig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainsJson,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{clobsJson,jdbcType=OTHER})
mapper.sql: t.id_, t.title_, t.subtitle_, t.full_title_, t.alias_, t.link_url_, t.target_blank_, t.seo_keywords_, t.seo_description_, t.author_, t.editor_, t.source_, t.image_, t.video_, t.video_orig_, t.video_duration_, t.audio_, t.audio_orig_, t.audio_duration_, t.file_, t.file_name_, t.file_length_, t.doc_, t.doc_orig_, t.doc_name_, t.doc_length_, t.article_template_, t.article_static_path_, t.allow_comment_, t.static_file_, t.mobile_static_file_, t.process_instance_id_, t.reject_reason_, t.baidu_push_, t.editor_type_, t.comments_, t.downloads_, t.favorites_, t.ups_, t.downs_, t.views_, t.day_views_, t.week_views_, t.month_views_, t.quarter_views_, t.year_views_, t.image_list_json_, t.file_list_json_, t.text_, t.markdown_, t.mains_json_, t.clobs_json_
